name: Ley Flow
effect: The mage can alter the flow of energy through a ley line, adjusting the flow anywhere from a torrent to a mere trickle, or, instead, he can change the current's direction of flow, sending the current back upstream to its source node. Before casting, the mage must decide whether to adjust the strength of the line's flow or alter its direction. He could, however, cast this spell twice, once to lower the strength and again to alter its flow or vice-versa.
